ygData.subject: Re: Suggestions for high teen levels in unrest?
ygData.msgSnippet: What I ve found to be the (unfortunate, imho) case of late in Unrest, is that it s safest to kill inside the house.  The major downside to this, at least in my
ygData.messageBody:
What I've found to be the (unfortunate, imho) case of late in Unrest, is
that it's safest to kill inside the house. The major downside to this, at
least in my case, is the major lag I pick up just by stepping inside the
house. It's pretty much gotten to the point that when I've seen it the
safest in Unrest is when there are groups camping the tower, the barroom,
the reclusive ghoul magi room, and some lower level groups in the room at
the side door and the back door room. The pathing in Unrest is so buggy
that if you try to pull something to the outside, chances are that the rest
of the house is going to come with it. That's half the reason I moved over
to Mistmoore once I hit lv 21.

Lohre Soulsaver
Bristlebane Server

----- Original Message -----
From: Sianne . <maggee1@...>
To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, September 24, 1999 9:29 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Suggestions for high teen levels in unrest?


> From: "Sianne ." <maggee1@...>
>
> I was at Unrest at lvl 23 with a full group including a 2nd cleric. The
> place was horrible. Death after death after death. Between deaths and
> running to the zone there were no points made. The only time we were
there
> successfully was in a room (hand room) i think. Then shortly a high lvl
> cleric came in and ran us out....i am now almost lvl 27 and haven't been
> back yet. I may try to go back soon though...
>
>
> >From: "William Hooker" <wahooker@...>
> >Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> >To: EQ_CLERIC@..., EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> >Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Suggestions for high teen levels in unrest?
> >Date: Fri, 24 Sep 1999 07:52:25 EDT
> >
> >From: "William Hooker" <wahooker@...>
> >
> >I have heard from many many people that unrest is a great place for a
> >cleric
> >to go starting around 14 or so. I am 17th (almost 18th) and am having
> >serious trouble there. Last night 6 people from my guild were there, all
> >15-20 and we had a rough time.
> >
> >We were at the back wall pulling from the back door. We had SoW and
invis
> >to undead on the puller at all times, but there were many times where she
> >ended up bringing quite a few too many ghouls. (tried to pull 1 and
> >suddenly there were 7 of them on us!)
> >
> >Are we hunting at too high a level, or are we pulling from the wrong
place?
> >Or do we just suck? We only had 2 deaths last night, but many many many
> >close calls. Lets just say thank god our druid was also saving 50% mana
> >for
> >heals.
> >
> >Meddik
> >Jaegergruppe
> >Bristlebane
> >
> >
> >
